articles.title: 8 possible cut or trade candidates for Patriots ahead of NFL free agency
articles.description:
If New England attempts to reload with another strong free agent class in 2026, these players could become salary cap casualties.

The post 8 possible cut or trade candidates for Patriots ahead of NFL free agency appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots may cut or trade players to manage salary cap ahead of 2026 free agency.
Eight players identified as potential casualties, impacting team roster decisions.
Local fans could see significant roster changes affecting team performance in upcoming seasons.
